name: Moroccan tagine
steps: Slice the onions into rings. Peel the potatoes and carrots and cut them into large pieces.
Roughly chop the tomatoes and the eggplant. Finely chop the garlic.
Brown the lamb shoulder in olive oil with all the spices (paprika, ginger, cinnamon, pepper, cumin), onion, and garlic.
Add the chopped tomatoes and a splash of water.
Cover the tagine and reduce the heat to very low.
After a few minutes, add the potato and carrot pieces. Simmer for 10 more minutes before adding the eggplant.
After about 15 minutes of cooking, add the preserved lemon cut into pieces. Add a little water if the dish is too dry.
When all the ingredients are cooked through, remove the tagine from the heat and finish with chopped parsley.
